greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Substitute ones for all nonzero digits in primorial base expansion of n, then convert back to decimal.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..30029
Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
program: (PARI) A328841(n) = { my(p=2, r=1, s=0); while(n, s += ((!!(n%p))*r); r *= p; n = n\p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (s); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 30 2019
